item.title: GMMs: visualization using PCA
item.description: The Dataset I chose the cran built-in iris dataset. Iris Dataset This dataset is a very nice dataset for clustering. Sorry for choosing an easy dataset! I had meant to work through the visualization first and repeat this with a more interesting example. The Data data <- iris[, !(names(iris) %in% c('Species'))] # filter out classes for training ggplot(iris, aes(x = Sepal.Width, y = Sepal.Length, color = Species)) + geom_point() + ggtitle('IRIS') + xlab('Sepal Width') + ylab('Sepal Length') The Objective The goal is to explore the data using clustering methods.
